attributes.action: treat criminals like criminals and not royalty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The legal system in this country is rubbish. We treat criminals like royalty, victims like criminals and then when we the victims try take a stand against these criminals, we end up being sued because the criminals have more rights under the Human Rights act that we, the victims do.

Treat victims as victims and support them, treat criminals like criminals and remove their T.V's from their cells, give them harsher sentences and stop making prisons like hotels.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
